alert.note: Alert for Clay; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 2:41AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Clay, northwestern Otter Tail, Wilkin and northeastern Richland Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 241 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brushvale, or near Wahpeton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lawndale around 300 AM CDT. Rothsay around 305 AM CDT. Erhard around 310 AM CDT. Pelican Rapids around 315 AM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 24 and 41. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 17 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
